Garuda-Sriwijaya 'Cerai' Lagi, Penumpang Gagal Terbang
07 Nov 2019, 05:07 by Tim detikcom


Foto: Dok. AP II

Jakarta - Hubungan antara PT Sriwijaya Air dan PT Garuda Indonesia Airlines Tbk (GIAA) kembali memanas. Penumpang pun jadi korban.Hal ini ramai terlihat di jagat media sosial. Para calon penumpang Sriwijaya tak bisa terbang sejak Rabu malam (6/11) dari berbagai kota seperti Jakarta, Padang, Manado dan lainnya.Salah satu calon penumpang yang diwawancarai CNBC Indonesia, Harvesty Ridoplika Panjaitan menceritakan pengalaman pahitnya harus gagal terbang akibat armada Sriwijaya tak bisa melayani penumpang. Harvesty salah satu penumpang yang gagal terbang hari ini, Kamis pagi.Ia harusnya terbang dari Jakarta-Medan pukul 5.20 naik Sriwijaya. Namun, pada pukul 19.30 Rabu malam (6/11) ia dapat informasi dari Traveloka, tempatnya membeli tiket bahwa penerbangannya dibatalkan. Ia menyatakan tak ada informasi dari pihak Sriwijaya."Nah tapi dari Sriwijaya enggak ada email, pokoknya enggak ada info apapun dari Sriwijaya. Itu infonya dari Traveloka," katanya seperti dikutip dari CNBC Indonesia, Kamis (7/11/2019).Ia sempat menghubungi pihak Sriwijaya, melalui layanan customer service untuk memastikan ulang, tapi harus gigit jari. "Nggak bisa nyambung. Katanya CS mereka lagi sibuk semua," katanya.Merasa putus asa, Harvesty akhirnya menelepon pihak Traveloka, untuk benar-benar memastikan nasib penerbangannya. Hasilnya, memang penerbangannya hari ini batal, ia membeli tiket penerbangan lainnya tanpa ada kepastian soal refund tiketnya."Nah kata Traveloka Sriwijaya confirm kalau mereka itu emang batal penerbangan nya hari ini," katanya.Siapa lagi yang jadi korban?Lanjut ke halaman berikutnya >>> (ang/ang)

Garuda-Sriwijaya 'Divorced' Again, Passengers Fail to Fly
Nov 07 2019, 05:07 by Tim detikcom


Photo: Doc. AP II

Jakarta - The relationship between PT Sriwijaya Air and PT Garuda Indonesia Airlines Tbk (GIAA) has again heated up. Passengers also become victims. This is very visible in the world of social media. Sriwijaya passenger candidates have not been able to fly since Wednesday night (6/11) from various cities such as Jakarta, Padang, Manado and others. One of the prospective passengers interviewed by CNBC Indonesia, Harvesty Ridoplika Panjaitan, said that his bitter experience had failed to fly due to Sriwijaya's fleet serve passengers. Harvesty was one of the passengers who failed to fly today, Thursday morning. He was supposed to fly from Jakarta-Medan at 5.20 riding Sriwijaya. However, at 19.30 Wednesday night (6/11) he got information from Traveloka, where he bought a ticket that his flight was canceled. He stated there was no information from the Srivijaya. "Well, but from Sriwijaya there was no e-mail, basically there was no info from Sriwijaya. That was the info from Traveloka," he said as quoted by CNBC Indonesia, Thursday (11/07/2019). contact the Sriwijaya, through customer service to re-confirm, but must bite the finger. "They can't connect. They say CS is busy," he said. Feeling hopeless, Harvesty finally called Traveloka to really confirm the fate of his flight. As a result, today the flight was canceled, he bought another flight ticket without any certainty about the refund of the ticket. >> (ang / ang)
